citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1250 on
29-Mar-19.
Arrived at premises at 1250. Spoke with animal caretaker who informed me that Mr. Seibel was not at the facility
today. Departed premises at 1300.

narrative:

today.  Departed premises at 1300.
